Package cdx.opencdx.iam.controller

Class OpenCDXIAMUserRestController

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.iam.controller.OpenCDXIAMUserRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/user", produces="application/json") public class OpenCDXIAMUserRestController extends Object
Controller for the /iam/user api's
